titleStmt.title: A sermon preached October the 19, 1690, before the right worshipful the mayor, aldermen, and sheriff, &c. of the town and county of New-Castle upon Tyne being the day appointed for a general thanks giving for His Majesties's safe return and happy success in Ireland / by Geo. Tullie ...
titleStmt.author: Tullie, George, 1652?-1695.
